test.create_query: CREATE TABLE gcd_codec (n DateTime64 CODEC(GCD, LZ4)) ENGINE = Memory
CREATE TABLE delta_codec (n DateTime64 CODEC(Delta, LZ4)) ENGINE = Memory
test.query: INSERT INTO gcd_codec SELECT * FROM generateRandom() LIMIT 1337228 SETTINGS max_threads=1
INSERT INTO delta_codec SELECT * FROM generateRandom() LIMIT 1337228 SETTINGS max_threads=1
